HiddenText.Name: Does everyone need to be a member of the Church or can I share this volunteer opportunity with members of other faiths?
HiddenText.OpenningText: Does everyone need to be a member of the Church, or can I share this volunteer opportunity with members of other faiths?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: All volunteers should be members of the Church because many of the discussion topics are focused on the Gospel, which is one of the greatest benefits of the discussions.
